item.title: IoT System Architecture Explained: The 5 Essential Layers (and How Otto Supports Them)
item.description: A complete, SEO-optimized guide to IoT system architecture. Discover what every IoT product needs—from sensors and protocols to gateways, cloud control planes, and applications—and how Otto ties it all together.
